mapper.select: select ORDERID, REMARKS, PURCHASE, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, MODIFYTIME, LOGISTICSID, FLAG, SUPPORTPRINT, COMPANYPHONE, COMPANYNO, COMPANYNAME, COMPANYID, CONTET, ALISHOPID, LOGISTICSORDERNO, STATUS, LOGISTICSTRACE from DB_ALIBBPORDER where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
